title: Share of population that uses a smartphone in North America 2011 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of population, containing a total of 8 data points.
Overall Share of population has increased over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Share of population, about 66.5 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Share of population about 29.3 was reached at Year 2011
